name: Marvel vs. DC
description:
I made a Marvel vs. DC fighting game since none exist. There's multiple characters and stages. You can play against the computer or watch a CPU vs. CPU match.

There's characters including: Spider-Man, Batman, the Hulk, the Joker, Iron Man, and Superman!

Make sure to read the Controls - READ ME file to learn how to play.

Want to see how I made it? Check out the video here:  (Note: This is NOT a trailer but a devlog)

Also feel free to check out my YouTube channel for more videos and games:

https://www.youtube.com/TylerGreen
